title: DC's during ranked game 8th august 2016 4pm IST
body: Alright, so me and my friend ,who also lives in india and his in game name is 'thelegendofawe', were playing ranked and when we started our 2nd ranked game we kept getting crash issues in the game. we kept getting random "attempting to reconnect's", but unlike most times, we could actually see the minions and the other champs moving on the rift, we were the only ones who couldnt do anything. And after reconnecting again this issue came up again in 2 min or so. and this time we were unable to even log in. after 5 min of waiting we finally reconnected and we reached just in time to see our nexus exploding. so yea i wish that you guys can make it so that me and my teammates do not lose lp for that match. and since i was in a promo series i hope you can take that one loss away. And there was another guy "SirIronBeard"(also an indian player" who was in a different game at that time but i contacted him and he had the same issues as well. i hope u do look into this. Yours respectfully, theguyinbronze1.

replies.body:
Since you and your teammates experienced this issue, it's likely to have been a local or regional issue. This could be caused by ISP or backbone routing problems to the server. I recommend using our [Connection Log Reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for that match to see suggestions to take to strengthen your connection to the server. 

Let me know if you still have issues after working through those steps.
